maqras.text: Alam Tara 'Ila Al-Ladhina Baddalu Ni`mata Allahi Kufraan Wa 'Ahallu Qawmahum Dara Al-Bawari
Jahannama Yaslawnaha Wa Bi'sa Al-Qararu
Wa Ja`alu Lillahi 'Andadaan Liyuđillu `An Sabilihi Qul Tamatta`u Fa'inna Masirakum 'Ila An-Nari
Qul Li`ibadiya Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Yuqimu As-Salaata Wa Yunfiqu Mimma Razaqnahum Sirraan Wa `Alaniyatan Min Qabli 'An Ya'tiya Yawmun La Bay`un Fihi Wa La Khilalun

Allahu Al-Ladhi Khalaqa As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđa Wa 'Anzala Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Fa'akhraja Bihi Mina Ath-Thamarati Rizqaan Lakum Wa Sakhkhara Lakumu Al-Fulka Litajriya Fi Al-Bahri Bi'amrihi Wa Sakhkhara Lakumu Al-'Anhara
Wa Sakhkhara Lakumu Ash-Shamsa Wa Al-Qamara Da'ibayni Wa Sakhkhara Lakumu Al-Layla Wa An-Nahar
Wa 'Atakum Min Kulli Ma Sa'altumuhu Wa 'In Ta`uddu Ni`mata Allahi La Tuhsuha 'Inna Al-'Insana Lazalumun Kaffarun
Wa 'Idh Qala 'Ibrahimu Rabbi Aj`al Hadha Al-Balada 'Aminaan Wa Ajnubni Wa Baniya 'An Na`buda Al-'Asnama
Rabbi 'Innahunna 'Ađlalna Kathiraan Mina An-Nasi Faman Tabi`ani Fa'innahu Minni Wa Man `Asani Fa'innaka Ghafurun Rahimun

Rabbana 'Inni 'Askantu Min Dhurriyati Biwadin Ghayri Dhi Zar`in `Inda Baytika Al-Muharrami Rabbana Liyuqimu As-Salaata Faj`al 'Af'idatan Mina An-Nasi Tahwi 'Ilayhim Wa Arzuqhum Mina Ath-Thamarati La`allahum Yashkuruna
Rabbana 'Innaka Ta`lamu Ma Nukhfi Wa Ma Nu`linu Wa Ma Yakhfa `Ala Allahi Min Shay'in Fi Al-'Arđi Wa La Fi As-Sama'i
Al-Hamdu Lillahi Al-Ladhi Wahaba Li `Ala Al-Kibari 'Isma`ila Wa 'Ishaqa 'Inna Rabbi Lasami`u Ad-Du`a'i
Rabbi Aj`alni Muqima As-Salaati Wa Min Dhurriyati Rabbana Wa Taqabbal Du`a'i
Rabbana Aghfir Li Wa Liwalidayya Wa Lilmu'uminina Yawma Yaqumu Al-Hisabu
Wa La Tahsabanna Allaha Ghafilaan `Amma Ya`malu Az-Zalimuna 'Innama Yu'uakhkhiruhum Liyawmin Tashkhasu Fihi Al-'Absaru
Muhti`ina Muqni`i Ru'usihim La Yartaddu 'Ilayhim Tarfuhum Wa 'Af'idatuhum Hawa'un

Wa 'Andhiri An-Nasa Yawma Ya'tihimu Al-`Adhabu Fayaqulu Al-Ladhina Zalamu Rabbana 'Akhkhirna 'Ila 'Ajalin Qaribin Nujib Da`wataka Wa Nattabi`i Ar-Rusula 'Awalam Takunu 'Aqsamtum Min Qablu Ma Lakum Min Zawalin
Wa Sakantum Fi Masakini Al-Ladhina Zalamu 'Anfusahum Wa Tabayyana Lakum Kayfa Fa`alna Bihim Wa Đarabna Lakumu Al-'Amthala
Wa Qad Makaru Makrahum Wa `Inda Allahi Makruhum Wa 'In Kana Makruhum Litazula Minhu Al-Jibalu
Fala Tahsabanna Allaha Mukhlifa Wa`dihi Rusulahu 'Inna Allaha `Azizun Dhu Antiqamin
Yawma Tubaddalu Al-'Arđu Ghayra Al-'Arđi Wa As-Samawatu Wa Barazu Lillahi Al-Wahidi Al-Qahhari
Wa Tara Al-Mujrimina Yawma'idhin Muqarranina Fi Al-'Asfadi
Sarabiluhum Min Qatiranin Wa Taghsha Wujuhahumu An-Naru
Liyajziya Allahu Kulla Nafsin Ma Kasabat 'Inna Allaha Sari`u Al-Hisabi
Hadha Balaghun Lilnnasi Wa Liyundharu Bihi Wa Liya`lamu 'Annama Huwa 'Ilahun Wahidun Wa Liyadhakkara 'Ulu Al-'Albabi
